tool_description: This service converts YouTube videos to MP3, WAV and offers an easy-to-use interface to quickly extract audio from video files.
name: YouTube Downloader
title: YouTube Downloader

api_list.name: Video to WAV
api_list.description: Converts a YouTube video to WAV.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The complete URL of the YouTube video you wish to convert. Make sure it's a valid YouTube link.

optional_parameters.name: audio_channel
optional_parameters.description: Audio channels count: '1' = Mono, '2' = Stereo, '5' = 5.0 Surround, '6' = 5.1 Surround, '7' = 6.1 Surround, '8' = 7.1 Surround.

optional_parameters.name: sample_rate
optional_parameters.description: The sample rate (in Hz) for the audio. Valid ranges are from 8000 Hz to 48000 Hz. It determines the audio quality.

api_list.name: Video to MP3
api_list.description: Converts a YouTube video to MP3.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The complete URL of the YouTube video you wish to convert. Make sure it's a valid YouTube link.

optional_parameters.name: sample_rate
optional_parameters.description: The sample rate (in Hz) for the audio. Valid ranges are from 8000 Hz to 48000 Hz. It determines the audio quality.

optional_parameters.name: bit_rate
optional_parameters.description: The audio bit rate in kbps. Higher bit rates typically result in better sound quality. Supported values include: 32,40,48,56,64,80,96,112,128,160,192,224,256,320

optional_parameters.name: audio_channel
optional_parameters.description: The number of audio channels. Use '1' for Mono and '2' for Stereo audio output.
